title: 求救！进不去游戏
author: 末影猎人
txt_content:
Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      

Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 7fe0271 --------
Generated 13-5-1 下午2:37

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.4.7
        Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
        Java Version: 1.7.0_21, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 22218000 bytes (21 MB) / 51097600 bytes (48 MB) up to 1060372480 bytes (1011 MB)
        JVM Flags: 4 total; -Xincgc -Xmx1024m -XX:PermSize=64m -XX:MaxPermSize=128m
        AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
        Suspicious classes: FML and Forge are installed
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        FML: MCP v7.26a FML v4.7.35.556 Minecraft Forge 6.6.2.534 0 mods loaded, 0 mods active
        LWJGL: 2.8.4
        OpenGL: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null
        Is Modded: Definitely; Client brand changed to 'forge,fml'
        Type: Client (map_client.txt)
        Texture Pack: Soartex_Fanver 2.3.zip
        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
        Vec3 Pool Size: ~~ERROR~~ NullPointerException: null[failed to get system properties (java.lang.NullPointerException)]


org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:228)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.createWindow(Display.java:303)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:845)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:754)
        at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:736)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(Minecraft.java:399)
        at asq.a(SourceFile:56)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:746)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT cd19867f ----------[img]file:///C:\Program Files\Tencent\QQ\Users\1208550605\Image\6HHAT$I_5V1))[Q2CSIW~D8.jpg[/img]










求求大家行行好，我哥哥想跟我一起玩但是他进不去游戏
JAVA也安装过了
大家帮帮忙吧

replies.txt_content: 和我一样！把显卡升级一下就行！我亲身体验

replies.author: xxbf
replies.txt_content:
940469583 发表于 2013-5-1 15:02 
和我一样！把显卡升级一下就行！我亲身体验
驱动升级还不行 或者是集显出现这个问题的话 就下我这个文件覆盖就可以了传送门

replies.author: LIVNDS
replies.txt_content:
一看就知道显卡太烂，没法启动········
 Bad video card drivers!

replies.author: LIVNDS
replies.txt_content:
这种时候用驱动精灵升级显卡就可以了，很简单，因为很智能·········

要是还是不行的话········

买张好一点的显卡就好了···········
